author: marvin
msg: Adjust minimum versions for a few Perl binding dependencies in Build.PL.  We
require 5.8.3 minimum for the Perl executable, but versions of core modules
which shipped with 5.10.0 and JSON::XS/Parse::RecDescent from the same era.
